targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    quantile(0.9)(duration_secs) as p90,
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet}) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute DESC

SELECT
    count() as queries,
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute DESC

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    countIf(rcode != 'NOERROR') / count() AS error_rate
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    countIf(dnssec_ok = 0) / count() AS error_rate
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    count() AS count,
    IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 as subnet
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY subnet, minute
ORDER BY minute, count DESC

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    countIf(dnssec_ok = 0) / count() AS error_rate
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY minute
ORDER BY minute

SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    count() AS count,
    type
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY type, minute
ORDER BY minute, count DESC

SELECT
    type,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY type
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    client_ip,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY client_ip
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    rcode,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY rcode
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    count() AS count,
    IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 as subnet
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY  subnet
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    dnssec_ok,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY dnssec_ok
ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    client_ip,
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY client_ip, minute
ORDER BY minute, count DESC

panels.title: Count by Client IP Over Time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    name,
    toStartOfMinute(Time) AS minute,
    count() AS count
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
GROUP BY name, minute
ORDER BY minute, count DESC

SELECT
    *
FROM dns_logs_mv
WHERE client_ip IN (${client_ip}) AND name IN (${name}) AND rcode IN (${rcode}) AND type IN (${type}) AND $__timeFilter(Time) AND IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 IN (${subnet})
ORDER BY Time ASC

list.definition:
select distinct
IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 as subnet
from dns_logs_mv
list.name: subnet
list.query:
select distinct
IPv4CIDRToRange(client_ip, 24).1 as subnet
from dns_logs_mv
